name: Racket: Nx
description: Racquetball meets Breakout inside a giant pinball machine! Racket: Nx is a new kind of game that challenges the limits of what you can do with a racket and ball in VR.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64bit) or higher Processor: Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64bit) or higher Processor: Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
